version_description:
We’ve designed and rebuilt our app from the ground up, just for you. It’s snappier and allows you to get into our gear super fast.
 
Beautiful Efficient Design
With our new navigation, we provide one-tap access to all of our most common app functions. 
 
Premium Shopping Experience
Our shop catalog has a fresh new look that brings our products to life and lets you shop with ease.
 
Connect with your Community
We’re excited to bring you fresh events and stories to help keep you sweaty and inspired.

3.0.1
Fixed rare crash when browsing order history
Fixed problem with custom keyboards

3.0
We’ve designed and rebuilt our app from the ground up, just for you. It’s snappier and allows you to get into our gear super fast.
 
Beautiful Efficient Design
With our new navigation, we provide one-tap access to all of our most common app functions. 
 
Premium Shopping Experience
Our shop catalog has a fresh new look that brings our products to life and lets you shop with ease.
 
Connect with your Community
We’re excited to bring you fresh events and stories to help keep you sweaty and inspired.
We've listened to your feedback and fixed some priority bugs. Guest favorites like filters are coming back soon.
We've listened to your feedback and fixed some priority bugs. Guest favorites like filters are coming back soon.

Thanks for all your feedback so far!
- added filters
- fixed a few issues within checkout

Yoga. Run. Party. SeaWheeze Half Marathon event info is now available.

- All new content and info as well as handy tools to make planning your SeaWheeze weekend easy breezy.

We’ve made finding our latest products a breeze and provided a streamlined view of our categories. We hope you love our filter improvements and notice the performance enhancements!

Thank you for all the continued feedback.

We’ve made finding our latest products a breeze and provided a streamlined view of our categories. We hope you love our filter improvements and notice the performance enhancements!

- fixed crashes affecting iPhone5

We’ve made finding our latest products a breeze and provided a streamlined view of our categories. We hope you love our filter improvements and notice the performance enhancements!

- fixed some iOS11 issues
- fixed crashes affecting iPhone5
- fixed slow startup on some devices
fixes some crashes and slowness associated to small amount of iOS 11 users

Updated to supported the latest iOS11 features, Apple Pay and iPhone X!

Also included:
- bug fixes and performance improvements throughout checkout
- cleaner design for product pages
- offline product browsing
Introducing ivivva by lululemon, we create gear for girls to lead boldly, play hard, and dream big.

Introducing ivivva by lululemon, we create gear for girls to lead boldly, play hard, and dream big.

fixes bug - some guests were unable to see the new girls section in the menu
Bug fixes which includes checkout and performance improvements
Bug fixes which includes checkout and performance improvements
Continued fixes to improve the checkout experience
Fix a crash affecting a few guests when adding to the shopping cart

* Join our global yoga ambassadors for 20, 45 or 60 minute yoga classes on the Community tab
* View product details from the bag by tapping on the image or title
* Refreshed color theme throughout the app

* Fixed crash issue on startup for some guests.

* Join our global yoga ambassadors for 20, 45 or 60 minute yoga classes on the Community tab
* View product details from the bag by tapping on the image or title
* Refreshed colour theme throughout the app

* Fixed ApplePay not working on some devices.
* Fixed crash issue on startup for some guests.

* Join our global yoga ambassadors for 20, 45 or 60 minute yoga classes on the Community tab
* View product details from the bag by tapping on the image or title
* Refreshed colour theme throughout the app

* View product details from the bag by tapping on the image or title
* Fixed some minor bugs
Bug fixes!
Bug fixes
Improved some minor login, address and checkout bugs
We have fixed some issues reported in checkout and when the app is opened from our new product emails.
We have fixed some issues reported in checkout via the App Store reviews.
Updates to support our runners and guests at the 2018 lululemon SeaWheeze Half Marathon and Sunset Festival.
Bug fixes
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
The latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements
The latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements
The latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements
The latest version contains a fix for gift card issues.
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
We said Namaste to a few bugs and showed them the door
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Can’t wait to get your gear? Buy online and pick up in store on the same day.
• Select your store
• Filter products by your local store to see what’s in stock where you are.
• Shop, then choose to pick up in store
• Add the gear you love to your bag and select “pick up in store”. Easy!

This version includes:
-an update to the community section for all things SeaWheeze!
-a fix for switching between gender tabs

This version includes:
- find your perfect bra size quiz. You’re four questions away from bra bliss.
- a fixed that improves face ID re-authentication

This release includes:
- bug fix for paypal transactions
- bug fix to support a smoother login experience
- bug fix to support bra band sizes
- crash fix for the bra size quiz

In this release:
- we introduce haptic feedback to improve accessibility
- Bug fixes for the home screen glitches

Bug fixes and improvements in this release include:
- Improved image loading on categories pages
- new home-screen navigation
- Improved checkout error messages

In the release:
- We updated our product pages with new Why We Made This content
- We added special hours to the store pages so you know when stores are open during the holidays

In this release:
- we made improvements to buy online pick up in-store on our product pages
- we added iOS 13 support
- we made minor bug fixes and performance enhancements

In this release:
-you can mark an order as a gift and write a message for the receipt
-crash fixes and performance enhancements
In this release, we fixed deep linking from email to the app.
This update contains stability and performance improvements.

- Now you can view all inseams on a single product page
- We added a model is wearing feature to the product pages
- Improved accessibility on product pages and adding products to your bag

• Accessibility improvements for voiceover including price ranges, selecting sizes and checkout
• Fixed an opening links in lululemon emails to the app
Performance improvements and bug fixes

In this release:
Accessibility improvements on product pages and in checkout
Performance enhancements and bug fixes

In this release:
- We updated the look and feel of our homepage
- Improvements to accessibility on our product pages and checkout

In this release:
- We updated the look and feel of our homepage
- Improvements to accessibility on our product pages and checkout
- Bug fixes and improvements

In this release:
We fixed an Apple Pay bug on the product pages
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
This is the last release that will support iOS 11

In this release:
We fixed deep linking issues with push notifications
We fixed an issue with images not showing on the category page
We made fixes to improve stability
A quick little bugfix on the account screen that you probably never noticed in the first place

You can now swipe through images for each product when on the category pages
Crash fixes in my bag & checkout
Voice over improvements when deleting payment types

a new look and feel on the category navigation
a new feature on the sports bras category page to allow you to view the back of all bras
minor bug fixes and performance improvements

Sending you good vibes | Find inspiration with our new welcome message that changes daily.
Sweat-free! | We’re always working hard to build a seamless app for you with continued bug fixes and performance improvements.
